spirals.title: UMM-Common Required
spirals.description: The NASA Unified Metadata Model/Mapping (UMM) includes a profile for elements that are common to all of the UMM Profiles, the UMM-Common Profile. These are the elements required by that profile.

items.name: Metadata Modified Date
items.description: Date on which the metadata record (not the resource) was created or updated within the catalogue.

items.name: Future Metadata Review Date
items.description: Anticipated date of a future metadata review.

items.name: Metadata Deletion Date
items.description: Date of metadata deletion.

items.name: Resource Creation Date
items.description: Date of creation of the cited resource

items.name: Resource Revision Date
items.description: Date of revision of the cited resource

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Distribution Contact
items.description: Contact information for the organization or individual that distributes the resource.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Theme Keyword
items.note: The general identification keywords usually have a type of theme and are refered to as theme keywords. Other types and vocabularies are used for other information. Service Entry Resource Format (SERF) requires a Science and a Service GCMD Keyword. This concept is called Subject in the CSW Specification.
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

items.name: Spatial Extent
items.description: The spatial extent of the resource.

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Resource on-line Link
items.description: Online link referencing additional information about the resource.

items.name: Browse URL
items.description: Location of the browse file on the Web.

items.name: Browse File Name
items.description: Name of the file holding the browse graphic.

items.name: Platform
items.description: The platform used to collect the observations.

items.name: Platform Keyword
items.description: Keywords that describe the platform used to collect the resource.

items.name: Platform Short Name
items.description: The platform used to collect the observations.

items.name: Instrument
items.description: Information about the instrument used to make the observations.

items.name: Instrument Keyword
items.description: Keywords that describe the instrument used to collect the resource.

items.name: Instrument Short Name
items.description: Short name (abbreviation) for the Instrument used to collect the observations.

spirals.title: UMM-Common Optional
spirals.description: The NASA Unified Metadata Model/Mapping (UMM) includes a profile for elements that are common to all of the UMM Profiles, the UMM-Common Profile. These are the optional elements included in that profile.

items.name: Metadata Language
items.description: Language of the metadata

items.name: Resource Language
items.description: The language of the resource.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Purpose
items.description: A paragraph describing the original purpose for collecting the dataset.

items.name: Resource Citation
items.description: Citation for the resource.

items.name: Quality Statement
items.description: Information about the quality of the data or any quality assurance procedures followed in producing the data.

items.name: Resource Use Constraints
items.description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Topic Category
items.description: High level category enumeration used in ISO

items.name: TwoDCoordinateSystem
items.description: Bounding extent defined in two dimensions with min and max values.

items.name: Resource on-line Link
items.description: Online link referencing additional information about the resource.

items.name: Browse URL
items.description: Location of the browse file on the Web.

items.name: Resource Format
items.description: The physical or digital manifestation of the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Project Keyword
items.description: Keywords that describe the Project used to collect the resource.

items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Resource Contact
items.description: The organization or person responsible for answering questions about the resource.

items.name: Distribution Contact
items.description: Contact information for the organization or individual that distributes the resource.

items.name: Processing Level
items.description: A code that indicates the extent of processing done in the creation of a dataset.

items.name: Theme Keyword
items.note: The general identification keywords usually have a type of theme and are refered to as theme keywords. Other types and vocabularies are used for other information. Service Entry Resource Format (SERF) requires a Science and a Service GCMD Keyword. This concept is called Subject in the CSW Specification.
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

items.name: Spatial Extent
items.description: The spatial extent of the resource.

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Project Name
items.description: The name of the project that the resource was associated with.

items.name: Resource on-line Link
items.description: Online link referencing additional information about the resource.

items.name: Browse URL
items.description: Location of the browse file on the Web.

items.name: Browse File Name
items.description: Name of the file holding the browse graphic.

items.description: The platform used to collect the observations.

items.name: Platform Keyword
items.description: Keywords that describe the platform used to collect the resource.

items.name: Platform Short Name
items.description: The platform used to collect the observations.

items.description: Information about the instrument used to make the observations.

items.name: Instrument Keyword
items.description: Keywords that describe the instrument used to collect the resource.

items.name: Instrument Short Name
items.description: Short name (abbreviation) for the Instrument used to collect the observations.

spirals.title: UMM-Common Optional
spirals.description: The NASA Unified Metadata Model/Mapping (UMM) includes a profile for elements that are common to all of the UMM Profiles, the UMM-Common Profile. These are the optional elements included in that profile.

items.name: Metadata Language
items.description: Language of the metadata

items.name: Resource Language
items.description: The language of the resource.

items.name: Resource Creation/Revision Date
items.description: The date the resource was created

items.name: Purpose
items.description: A paragraph describing the original purpose for collecting the dataset.

items.name: Resource Citation
items.description: Citation for the resource.

items.name: Quality Statement
items.description: Information about the quality of the data or any quality assurance procedures followed in producing the data.

items.name: Resource Use Constraints
items.description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.
